content.text:
# Religion and agriculture

Religion and agriculture have been closely associated since Neolithic times and the development of early Orphic religions based upon fertility and the seasons.
See also
* Agricultural spiritualism
* Christianity and agriculture
* Earth goddess
* Fall of man
* Fertility rite
* Human sacrifice
* List of fertility deities
References
External links
* Bernard Stiegler, [http://www.arsindustrialis.org/node/2925 Take Care]
* Paul Hanley (2006) [http://www.thespiritofagriculture.com The Spirit of Agriculture].  George Ronald, Oxford. 226 pp

---
